title: Franchise value of the Toronto Blue Jays 2002 to 2019
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, about 610.0 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 568.0 was reported at Year 2013
